vue-barcode
Docs GitHub Explore About

vue-barcode v1.0.1

Bar code component for Vue.js.

Examples


HTML:
<div id="app">
  <barcode value="1234567890"></barcode>
  <barcode value="1234567890" :options="{ lineColor: '#007bff' }" tag="svg"></barcode>
  <barcode value="1234567890" tag="img"></barcode>
</div>
JavaScript:
window.onload = function () {
  Vue.component(VueBarcode.name, VueBarcode);

  new Vue({
    el: '#app',
  });
};
